mapper.select: select listNo, title, area, name, content, picture from RecommandList
select listNo, title, area, name, content, picture from RecommandList order by listNo desc limit #{start}, #{length}
mapper.insert: insert into RecommandList ( listNo, title, area, name, content, picture ) values ( #{listNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{content, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{picture, jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
